entry.title: symphonic devotion
entry.summary:
Author: hansuckss

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,203Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 3

Summary: ‚ÄúWhen fate is messed with, it punishes those who messes with the flow of time and rewards those who were affected.‚Äù ¬†After taking his own life in a bathtub, Derek Hale wakes up as a ghost trapped in a strange, distorted version of his neighborhood‚Äîalongside another ghost named ‚ÄòStiles‚Äô. Neither remembers anything about their past, but they're inexplicably tied to one another. All they have to guide them are an old piano and two eerily familiar houses.Or; two memory-less spirits search for answers about who they were, why they're connected, and what this so-called ‚Äúhappy ending‚Äù is all about‚Äîonly to discover comfort and companionship in each other along the way.¬†- as seen on wattpad -

Summary: ‚ÄúDo you think psychopaths can fall in love?‚ÄùStiles blinks and slants his head, studying Derek's face, eyebrows drawing in a fraction as he considers his answer.‚ÄúI think true love requires empathy, which people with antisocial personality disorders tend to lack. But to answer your question, yes. It may be their version of what they believe love is. If they‚Äôve convinced themselves it‚Äôs true, it is.‚ÄùDerek hums in response with a short bob of his head, holding Stiles‚Äô gaze.‚ÄúIs that what you‚Äôve gleaned so far, if psychopaths can love?‚Äù Stiles asks him, his tone curious.Derek shrugs. ‚ÄúSome of it, yeah.
